ref.mixed-citation: Voegel R, Padulosi S, Bergamini N, Lawrence T (2012) Red list for crops-a tool for monitoring genetic erosion, supporting re-introduction into cultivation and guiding conservation efforts. In: On farm conservation of neglected and underutilized species: status, trends and novel approaches to cope with climate change. Proceedings of an international conference, Frankfurt, Germany, 14–16 June, 2011. Bioversity International, pp 137–142
